text: The Indonesia national under-20 football team represents Indonesia in international football completions. They have been to the 1979 FIFA World Youth Championship where they exited in the group stage. ==Tournament record== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup=== Year Round Position 1977 Did not enter Did not enter Did
